backend/main.mo: Main backend canister providing feature requests, user profiles, announcements, assignments, and study planner task types with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend pages, components, hooks, and configs.
frontend/.release/production-version.txt: Stores the currently promoted production draft version number.
frontend/.release/README.md: Explains CI/CD promotion metadata usage and how production-version.txt controls live deployment.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster for the React app.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentChatbo: Advanced multilingual assignment chatbot with voice, OCR, image upload, and downloadable outputs.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout with header navigation, mobile drawer menu, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/StudentSathiAssi: Implements a chat-style assistant with voice input, OCR via Tesseract, auto-scrolling, and assignment generation/confirmation workflows.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Dai: Notes that DailyProgressChart.tsx must remain unchanged for weekly chart fixes.
Renders a daily study progress donut chart summarizing completed, pending tasks, and total study time.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Pro: Wraps and switches between daily or weekly progress charts based on the selected view type.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Sub: Displays a subject label with a color class computed from subject metadata.
Provides a searchable dropdown to filter subjects and show counts, allowing selection or clearing.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Wee: Renders a weekly progress donut chart using completed tasks and total completed study time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query mutations for feature requests, assignment generation, conversation saving, and study planner task operations, including topic extraction and confirmation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSort.t: Stores and retrieves the study planner sort mode in localStorage with a simple setter.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSubjec: Manages daily and weekly subject filters separately and persists them in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerView.t: Stores and restores the study planner view mode (daily or weekly) using localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Implements a rich assignment formatting page with multilingual UI, editor features, and export options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with links to all tools and a hero section.
Generates a leave application letter from user input and supports copying the result.
frontend/src/pages/NotesCleanerPage.tsx: Provides a UI to input rough notes, process them into cleaned formatted text, and copy the result.
frontend/src/pages/RequestFeaturePage.ts: Displays a form for users to submit feature requests with optional email, sending data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: Lets users input personal details and projects to generate a simple text-based resume and copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx: A full study-planner interface handling tasks, filters, authentication, guest mode, sorting, and exporting.
Utility functions to parse human-readable durations into minutes and format minutes back into duration strings.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerGuestStor: Manages guest-mode study tasks in localStorage, including loading, saving, creating, updating, and deleting tasks.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerPdfExport: Generates printable HTML for exporting study tasks and opens a print window to save as PDF. Builds styled task sections and summary info based on daily or weekly view.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerSort.ts: Provides deterministic sorting for study tasks by date/time or default ID order. Ensures stable ordering using timestamps and task IDs.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTaskDateT: Converts and formats optional date/time fields for study tasks, including parsing HTML inputs and producing readable date-time strings. Handles bigint and number date formats safely.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTxtExport: Creates a plain‑text export of study tasks with headers, summaries, and task details, then downloads it as a .txt file. Formats date/time and optional priority fields.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerWeek.ts: Handles weekly date calculations, including unwrapping optional dates, normalizing bigint/number timestamps, and determining week boundaries. Provides helpers to check week membership and find weekday indices.
frontend/src/utils/subjectColorMapping.t: Maps subjects to predefined color names and Tailwind CSS classes for badges and indicators. Exposes helpers to get persisted colors and corresponding class names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Parses URL and hash parameters, stores them in sessionStorage, and retrieves or clears them as needed. Supports persisted parameter handling with URL precedence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata for promoting draft version 73 to production and tracks a known UI issue with task strike‑through behavior.
unknown.txt: Describes the fixed assignment‑editor format and embedded Student Sathi Assistant UI behavior with editing tools, downloads, autosave, and chat features.
